column4: How can you view the files included with a package listed in synaptic?
You can view the files that comes with the package on Synaptic. There's a tab on the package info.
I am looking at the information for a package I have not yet installed, so it won't list that information
Ah. I see what you meant. I tried it myself and never really noticed that I don't get to see the files if it's not yet installed. Sorry. @_@
